content.title: 200% funding goal achieved - thank you everyone!
content.creator:
SMO SmartMicroOptics
March 21, 2025
content.content:
We want to say THANK YOU!
There is still one month to go, and weâ€™ve got twice our original goal!
We expect smooth operational processes, as every single part of the system is defined. We already started to make some of these parts.
Do not forget to spread the word about this project among your contacts ðŸ˜‰ ! This is another wonderful way to support the DIPLE2 project!
Any questions, please don't hesitate to reach out, we are here to listen to your suggestions and questions.
Thank you so much for your support backers!
Take a look at our Instagram account (feed, reels and stories) to see examples of use for your next DIPLE2.
thanks again!
the SMO Team
